docs.snippet: GUATEMALA, Jan. 31 (Reuters)--Guatemala, a traditional Central American battlefield for extremists of the left and right, is moving nervously toward general elections on March 1 amid a terrorist campaign of bombings and assassinations....
docs.lead_paragraph: GUATEMALA, Jan. 31 (Reuters)--Guatemala, a traditional Central American battlefield for extremists of the left and right, is moving nervously toward general elections on March 1 amid a terrorist campaign of bombings and assassinations.
docs.abstract: Campaign of terrorist bombings and assassinations marks approach of Mar 1 gen elections; Govt suspends Const for 15 days after assassination of journalist I Zarco; fatal shooting of Col O Giron Perrone, leader in '54 coup, and unsuccessful attempt to shoot Christian Dem party pres candidate J L Caballero noted; Finance Min Fuentes Pieruccini is governing Revolutionary party Pres candidate and Col Arana Osorio is right-wing Natl Liberation Movement candidate

headline.main: Renewed Guatemalan Violence Marks the Approach of Election

docs.snippet: MEMPHIS, Jan. 31 (AP)-- Four black Marines convicted of assault in disturbances at the Memphis Naval Air Station that injured 23 persons have been sentenced to terms ranging from one to six months at hard labor....
docs.lead_paragraph: MEMPHIS, Jan. 31 (AP)-- Four black Marines convicted of assault in disturbances at the Memphis Naval Air Station that injured 23 persons have been sentenced to terms ranging from one to six months at hard labor.
docs.abstract: 4 black marines convicted of assault in July '69 disturbance at Memphis Naval Air Station get prison terms of from 1 to 6 mos; were cleared of charges of rioting and conspiracy to riot

headline.main: 4 BLACKS SENTENCED IN AIR STATION FIGHT

docs.snippet: Herman Badillo, former Borough President of the Bronx, began an effort yesterday to mediate between the Young Lords, a Puerto Rican militant organization, and the First Spanish Methodist Church in East Harlem, which the Young Lords occupied fo 11 ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Herman Badillo, former Borough President of the Bronx, began an effort yesterday to mediate between the Young Lords, a Puerto Rican militant organization, and the First Spanish Methodist Church in East Harlem, which the Young Lords occupied fo 11 days, until Jan. 7.
docs.abstract: Puerto Rican leader H Badillo meets with Young Lords and 1st Spanish Meth Ch reprs in effort to mediate dispute over Lords demand for space in ch for free-breakfast program

headline.main: BADILLO CONFERS WITH YOUNG LORDS; Then Sees Church Officials In Mediation Attempt

docs.snippet: BATON ROUGE, Jan. 31-- Pistol Pete Maravich of Louisiana State broke Oscar Robertson's collegiate scoring record tonight with a 15-foot jump shot that gave him a career total of 2,974 points....
docs.lead_paragraph: BATON ROUGE, Jan. 31-- Pistol Pete Maravich of Louisiana State broke Oscar Robertson's collegiate scoring record tonight with a 15-foot jump shot that gave him a career total of 2,974 points.
docs.abstract: P Maravich (LSU) sets career scoring record (2,987 points); previous mark was set by O Robinson (Cincinnati)

headline.main: L.S.U.Star Gets 53 For Total of 2,987 In 109-86 Victory

docs.snippet: THERE is something arresting about publishing that is absent from the manufacturing of seamless hose or  even from the exploits of the herring fleet. That is true, I think, because publishing is a waterway that drains from so many streams, some br...
docs.lead_paragraph: THERE is something arresting about publishing that is absent from the manufacturing of seamless hose or even from the exploits of the herring fleet. That is true, I think, because publishing is a waterway that drains from so many streams, some bright, some muddy. Technological development in press work and composition, the economics of cost and distribution,

docs.snippet: The first major crackdown by the Federal anticrime strike force in Brooklyn has brought about the seizure of $175,000 worth of illegal cocaine and the breaching of an international cocaine-smuggling ring, Federal authorities announced yesterday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The first major crackdown by the Federal anticrime strike force in Brooklyn has brought about the seizure of $175,000 worth of illegal cocaine and the breaching of an international cocaine-smuggling ring, Federal authorities announced yesterday.
docs.abstract: Atty Gen Mitchell and US Atty Neaher rept Fed anticrime strike force in Bklyn has seized $175,000 worth of illegal cocaine, broken internatl smuggling ring; disclose arrest of 6 of 9 persons sought under indictment returned by Fed grand jury in Bklyn; steps leading to arrests traced

headline.main: CRIME FORCE HERE CRACKS DRUG RING; Six Suspects and $175,000 in Cocaine Are Seized
